content:
Great choices! Depeche Mode and The Human League are synth-pop legends, and you can't go wrong with their discographies. And Thundercat and Kamasi Washington are both incredible jazz artists who are pushing the boundaries of the genre.

That's awesome that you've found a new playlist to enjoy on your daily commute! "Retro Electro" sounds like a perfect fit for your morning drive. Spotify playlists can be a great way to discover new music and artists, and it's even more exciting when you stumble upon one that resonates with your tastes.

If you enjoy the "Retro Electro" playlist, you might also want to check out other similar playlists on Spotify, such as "Synthwave" or "Neon Dreams". These playlists often feature a mix of classic synth-pop and modern artists who are influenced by the genre.

Additionally, you could explore other jazz and electronic playlists on Spotify, such as "Jazztronica" or "Electric Jazz", which might introduce you to more artists like Thundercat and Kamasi Washington.

Do you have a favorite song or artist that you've discovered on the "Retro Electro" playlist so far?
